name: NBA-Stat-Dashboard
description: # Background The NBA Statistics Dashboard will provide the average NBA fan with the ability to manipulate and analyze player-specific data in an easy and interactive way. The goal of this dashboard is to allow users to understand the NBA data trends and player comparisons that they are the most interested in. Users will have complete control to select any past or present NBA players and compare them across a variety of seasons, metrics, and data visualizations (see the **Functionality & MVP** and **Bonus** sections for more info).
